faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.intro: ðŸ’¬ Please click on the question you're searching an answer for:

questions.question: How can we collaborate with you?
questions.answer: You can contact us via email at contact@flexmind.agency or through Instagram at @flexmind_agency. We will suggest a remote or in-person meeting, or connect via call or messaging based on your preference.

questions.question: What is the average project delivery time?
questions.answer: Project delivery time depends on its complexity. However, most of our projects are delivered within 1 to 4 weeks.

questions.question: How much does a project cost?
questions.answer: Our pricing depends on the complexity of your project and the size of your company. Final pricing is always discussed and agreed upon with our sales team.

questions.question: Do you offer after-sales support?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide full support after delivery. Our team will accompany you until you are completely satisfied with the final result.

questions.question: What if I don't have any visual identity or logo?
questions.answer: No problem! Our creative department will work closely with you to craft a custom visual identity and branding that reflects your vision and goals.

questions.question: Why should we choose you and not another company?
questions.answer: At Flexmind, we pride ourselves on our speed, reliability, and availability. We deliver high-quality work within short deadlines, maintain constant communication with our clients, and are always ready to adapt to your needs. Your satisfaction is our priority.
